heading: Revitalizing Pune's Rivers: The Mula-Mutha River Rejuvenation Project
description: The Mula-Mutha River Rejuvenation Project is aimed at transforming the Mula, Mutha, and Mula-Mutha rivers into valuable assets for the city. With urbanization, these water bodies have faced increasing levels of pollution and degradation. The goal of this project is to improve the state of the rivers and make them more accessible and enjoyable for the people of Pune.By revitalizing these rivers, the Pune Municipal Corporation hopes to not only address environmental and health issues, but also create recreational and educational opportunities for the community and potentially drive economic growth.
